basic.description: This course is an acting workshop oriented to particular problems the actor confronts in dealing with historic periods in dramatic literature or material of post-realistic and contemporary styles and thought. May be repeated to a maximum of nine semester hours.
basic.subject: TPP
basic.title: Acting Techniques III: Acting Problems in Genre and Style

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: TPP 2110r, TPP 2111r, TPP 3711, and/or instructor permission.
